metadata.Title: CVE-2020-29362 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in p11-kit 0.21.1 through 0.23.21. A heap-basedbuffer over-read has been discovered in the RPC protocol used by thep11-kitserver/remote commands and the client library. When the remote entitysupplies a byte array through a serialized PKCS#11 function call, thereceiving entity may allow the reading of up to 4 bytes of memory past theheap allocation.

criterions.comment: p11-kit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
